response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this exceptional piece, I am offering it to you at a special price of $15,000. I trust that you will find its value far beyond the monetary figure.
